MonsterTrait.Name: Devil's Sight
MonsterTrait.Text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

MonsterTrait.Name: Flyby
MonsterTrait.Text: The devil doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

MonsterTrait.Name: Limited Spines
MonsterTrait.Text: The devil has twelve tail spines. Used spines regrow by the time the devil finishes a long rest.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The devil makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its fork or two with its tail spines.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (2d4) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Fork
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Tail Spine
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/80 ft ., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.
